title: (x) Femme en vogue - Modula Sans {Yves}
content:
![f&v.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3278.jpg)   
   
Ik kan dit lettertype nergens vinden.   
Kennen jullie hem?

 [‹ (x) Chock full o' Nuts - (similar to) Metro, Mandate {Yves, Chesh}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003620/http:/typophile.com/node/4192 "Go to previous forum topic") [Robert Indiana "LOVE" Statue ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003620/http:/typophile.com/node/4081 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: De "klassieker" Modula Sans van Emigre. [Dit](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003620/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PModR.html) is 'm.
Had ik moeten weten maar ja ik ben Hollander he.
[Rudy Vanderlans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003620/http:/www.emigre.com/ArticleCriticalConditions.php) ook ;) Ik ben ook maar een Belg :D
